EmailTemplate.name: RE: Turbonomic - Conversation follow up (1494416816.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Turbonomic - Conversation follow up (1494416816.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean DocumentEmail false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Raj, We spoke again very briefly yesterday but it seems I keep catching you in the middle of meetings as I am calling out of the blue. What I was hoping is to schedule a fifteen minute introduction call where we discuss the projects you and the team at Covington & Burling are currently working on, what projects and goals you have for the rest of 2017 and then how Turbonomic can help you achieve some of your goals. Do you have 15 minutes over the next couple of weeks that would work better for you so I am no longer calling out of the blue? Best, James From: James Wilcox Sent: Tuesday, May 2, 2017 11:33 AM To: 'rarora@cov.com' <rarora@cov.com> Subject: Turbonomic - Conversation follow up Raj – Thank you for taking the time to speak with me today. As discussed, below are some materials that explain the value our customers see in Turbonomic. Please don’t hesitate to reach out if you have any questions. ROI White Paper for Turbonomic
